RestrictedCashCurrent.label: Restricted Cash, Current
RestrictedCashCurrent.description: Amount of cash restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as current. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits.

SellingAndMarketingExpense.label: Selling and Marketing Expense
SellingAndMarketingExpense.description: The aggregate total amount of expenses directly related to the marketing or selling of products or services.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Number of Shares Authorized
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of shares authorized for issuance under share-based payment arrangement.

SignificantSupplyCommitmentRemainingMini.label: Supply Commitment, Remaining Minimum Amount Committed
SignificantSupplyCommitmentRemainingMini.description: The floor amount as of the balance sheet date that the entity must expend to satisfy the terms of disclosed arrangements (excluding long-term commitments) in which the entity must commit resources to supply goods or services to one or more customers.

AdjustmentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForSha.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Decrease for Tax Withholding Obligation
AdjustmentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForSha.description: Amount of decrease to equity for grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement.

EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNon.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Nonvested Award, Cost Not yet Recognized, Amount
EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNon.description: Amount of cost not yet recognized for nonvested award under share-based payment arrangement.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherNoncurrentLiabili.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Noncurrent Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherNoncurrentLiabili.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in noncurrent operating liabilities classified as other.

InventoryNoncurrent.label: Inventory, Noncurrent
InventoryNoncurrent.description: Inventories not expected to be converted to cash, sold or exchanged within the normal operating cycle.

PaymentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForShareB.label: Payment, Tax Withholding, Share-based Payment Arrangement
PaymentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForShareB.description: Amount of cash outflow to satisfy grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement.

RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.label: Repayments of Long-term Debt
RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

InventoryWriteDown.label: Inventory Write-down
InventoryWriteDown.description: Amount of loss from reductions in inventory due to subsequent measurement adjustments, including, but not limited to, physical deterioration, obsolescence, or changes in price levels.

ProceedsFromStockPlans.label: Proceeds from Stock Plans
ProceedsFromStockPlans.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from the stock plan during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeStoc.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Employee Stock Purchase Plan
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeStoc.description: Aggregate change in value for stock issued during the period as a result of employee stock purchase plan.

FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.label: Finance Lease, Principal Payments
FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.description: Amount of cash outflow for principal payment on finance lease.

PurchaseObligation.label: Purchase Obligation
PurchaseObligation.description: Minimum amount of purchase arrangement in which the entity has agreed to expend funds to procure goods or services from a supplier.

PurchaseObligationDueInNextTwelveMonths.label: Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year One
PurchaseObligationDueInNextTwelveMonths.description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PurchaseObligationFutureMinimumPaymentsR.label: Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
PurchaseObligationFutureMinimumPaymentsR.description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligatio.label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Purchases
UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligatio.description: The amount purchased during the period under an unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation (for example, under the take-or-pay or throughput contract).
